verses.verse: The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> [were] Perez, <S%H6557><s%> Hezron, <S%H2696><s%> Carmi, <S%H3756><s%> Hur, <S%H2354><s%> and Shobal. <S%H7732><s%>

And Reaiah <S%H7211><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shobal <S%H7732><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jahath, <S%H3189><s%> and Jahath <S%H3189><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Ahumai <S%H267><s%> and Lahad. <S%H3855><s%> These <S%H428><s%> [were] the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Zorathites. <S%H6882><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> [were] the sons of Etam: <S%H1><s%> Jezreel, <S%H5862><s%> Ishma, <S%H3157><s%> and Idbash; <S%H3457><s%> and the name <S%H3031><s%> of their sister <S%H8034><s%> [was] Hazzelelponi. <S%H269><s%>

And Penuel <S%H6439><s%> [was] the father of Gedor, <S%H1><s%> and Ezer <S%H1446><s%> the father of Hushah. <S%H5829><s%> These <S%H1><s%> [were] the sons <S%H2364><s%> of Hur, <S%H428><s%> the first-born of Ephrathah, <S%H1121><s%> the father of Bethlehem. <S%H2354><s%>
And Ashhur, <S%H806><s%> the father of Tekoa, <S%H1><s%> had <S%H8620><s%> two <S%H1961><s%> wives, <S%H8147><s%> Helah <S%H802><s%> and Naarah. <S%H2458><s%>

And Naarah <S%H5292><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> him Ahuzzam, <S%H275><s%> Hepher, <S%H2660><s%> Temeni, <S%H8488><s%> and Haahashtari. <S%H326><s%> These <S%H428><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naarah. <S%H5292><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Helah <S%H2458><s%> [were] Zereth, <S%H6889><s%> Izhar <S%H3328><s%> and Ethnan. <S%H869><s%>

And Koz <S%H6976><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Anub <S%H6036><s%> and Zobebah, <S%H6637><s%> and the families <S%H4940><s%> of Aharhel <S%H316><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Harum. <S%H2037><s%>

And Jabez <S%H3258><s%> was more <S%H4480><s%> honorable <S%H3513><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Jabez <S%H3258><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Because <S%H3588><s%> I bore <S%H3205><s%> [him] with pain. <S%H6090><s%>"

Now Jabez <S%H3258><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> on the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Oh <S%H518><s%> that Thou wouldst bless <S%H1288><s%> me indeed, <S%H1288><s%> and enlarge <S%H7235><s%> my border, <S%H1366><s%> and that Thy hand <S%H3027><s%> might be with me, and that Thou wouldst keep <S%H6213><s%> [me] from harm, <S%H9567><s%> that [it] may not pain <S%H6087><s%> me!" And God <S%H430><s%> granted <S%H935><s%> him what <S%H834><s%> he requested. <S%H7592><s%>
And Chelub <S%H3620><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Shuhah <S%H7746><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Mehir, <S%H4243><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> was the father of Eshton. <S%H1><s%>

And Eshton <S%H850><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Beth-rapha and Paseah, <S%H6454><s%> and Tehinnah <S%H8468><s%> the father of Ir-nahash. These <S%H1><s%> are the men <S%H428><s%> of Recah. <S%H376><s%>
Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kenaz <S%H7073><s%> [were] Othniel <S%H6274><s%> and Seraiah. <S%H8304><s%> And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Othniel <S%H6274><s%> [was] Hathath. <S%H2867><s%>

And Meonothai <S%H4587><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Ophrah, <S%H6084><s%> and Seraiah <S%H8304><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Joab <S%H3097><s%> the father of Ge-harashim, for they were craftsmen. <S%H1><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> [were] Iru, <S%H5900><s%> Elah <S%H425><s%> and Naam; <S%H5277><s%> and the son <S%H1121><s%> of Elah <S%H425><s%> [was] Kenaz. <S%H7073><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jehallelel <S%H3094><s%> [were] Ziph <S%H2128><s%> and Ziphah, <S%H2129><s%> Tiria <S%H8493><s%> and Asarel. <S%H840><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ezrah <S%H5834><s%> [were] Jether, <S%H3500><s%> Mered, <S%H4778><s%> Epher, <S%H6081><s%> and Jalon. <S%H3210><s%> (And these <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bithia <S%H1332><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Mered <S%H4778><s%> took <S%H3947><s%>) and she conceived <S%H2029><s%> [and bore] Miriam, <S%H4813><s%> Shammai, <S%H8060><s%> and Ishbah <S%H3431><s%> the father of Eshtemoa. <S%H1><s%>

And his Jewish <S%H3057><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Jered <S%H3382><s%> the father of Gedor, <S%H1><s%> and Heber <S%H1446><s%> the father of Soco, <S%H2268><s%> and Jekuthiel <S%H1><s%> the father of Zanoah. <S%H7755><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the wife <S%H802><s%> of Hodiah, <S%H1941><s%> the sister <S%H269><s%> of Naham, <S%H5163><s%> [were] the fathers of Keilah <S%H1><s%> the Garmite <S%H7084><s%> and Eshtemoa <S%H1636><s%> the Maacathite. <S%H851><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shimon <S%H7889><s%> [were] Amnon <S%H550><s%> and Rinnah, <S%H7441><s%> Benhanan <S%H1135><s%> and Tilon. <S%H8436><s%> And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ishi <S%H3469><s%> [were] Zoheth <S%H2105><s%> and Ben-zoheth.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shelah <S%H7956><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> [were] Er <S%H6147><s%> the father of Lecah <S%H1><s%> and Laadah <S%H3922><s%> the father of Mareshah, <S%H3935><s%> and the families <S%H1><s%> of the house <S%H4762><s%> of the linen <S%H4940><s%> workers <S%H1004><s%> at Beth-ashbea;

and Jokim, <S%H3137><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Cozeba, <S%H3578><s%> Joash, <S%H3060><s%> Saraph, <S%H8315><s%> who <S%H834><s%> ruled <S%H1166><s%> in Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and Jashubi-lehem. And the records <S%H1697><s%> are ancient. <S%H6267><s%>

These <S%H1992><s%> were the potters <S%H3335><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Netaim <S%H5196><s%> and Gederah; <S%H1448><s%> they lived <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> with the king <S%H4428><s%> for his work. <S%H4399><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> [were] Nemuel <S%H5241><s%> and Jamin, <S%H3226><s%> Jarib, <S%H3402><s%> Zerah, <S%H2226><s%> Shaul; <S%H7586><s%>
Shallum <S%H7967><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Mibsam <S%H4017><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Mishma <S%H4927><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Mishma <S%H4927><s%> [were] Hammuel <S%H2536><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Zaccur <S%H2139><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Shimei <S%H8096><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

Now Shimei <S%H8096><s%> had sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> daughters; <S%H1323><s%> but his brothers <S%H251><s%> did not have <S%H369><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> did all <S%H3605><s%> their family <S%H4940><s%> multiply <S%H7235><s%> like <S%H5704><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>
And they lived <S%H3427><s%> at Beersheba, <S%H884><s%> Moladah, <S%H4137><s%> and Hazar-shual,
at Bilhah, <S%H9053><s%> Ezem, <S%H6107><s%> Tolad, <S%H8434><s%>
Bethuel, <S%H9066><s%> Hormah, <S%H2767><s%> Ziklag, <S%H6860><s%>
Beth-marcaboth, Hazar-susim, Beth-biri, and Shaaraim. <S%H8189><s%> These <S%H428><s%> [were] their cities <S%H5892><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the reign <S%H4427><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%>
And their villages <S%H9161><s%> [were] Etam, <S%H5862><s%> Ain, <S%H5871><s%> Rimmon, <S%H9558><s%> Tochen, <S%H8507><s%> and Ashan, <S%H6228><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> cities; <S%H5892><s%>

and all <S%H3605><s%> their villages <S%H9161><s%> that [were] around <S%H5439><s%> the same <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Baal. <S%H9058><s%> These <S%H2088><s%> [were] their settlements, <S%H4186><s%> and they have their genealogy. <S%H3187><s%>
And Meshobab <S%H4877><s%> and Jamlech <S%H3230><s%> and Joshah <S%H3144><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amaziah, <S%H558><s%>
and Joel <S%H3100><s%> and Jehu <S%H3058><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joshibiah, <S%H3143><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Seraiah, <S%H8304><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Asiel, <S%H6221><s%>
and Elioenai, <S%H454><s%> Jaakobah, <S%H3291><s%> Jeshohaiah, <S%H3439><s%> Asaiah, <S%H6222><s%> Adiel, <S%H5717><s%> Jesimiel, <S%H3450><s%> Benaiah, <S%H1141><s%>

Ziza <S%H2124><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shiphi, <S%H8230><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Allon, <S%H438><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jedaiah, <S%H3042><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shimri, <S%H8113><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shemaiah; <S%H8098><s%>

these <S%H428><s%> mentioned <S%H935><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%> [were] leaders <S%H5387><s%> in their families; <S%H4940><s%> and their fathers' houses <S%H1004><s%> increased <S%H6555><s%> greatly. <S%H7230><s%>

And they went <S%H1980><s%> to the entrance <S%H3996><s%> of Gedor, <S%H1446><s%> even <S%H5704><s%> to the east <S%H4217><s%> side <S%H4217><s%> of the valley, <S%H1516><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> pasture <S%H4829><s%> for their flocks. <S%H6629><s%>

And they found <S%H4672><s%> rich <S%H8082><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%> pasture, <S%H4829><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> was broad <S%H7342><s%> and quiet <S%H8252><s%> and peaceful; <S%H7961><s%> for those who lived <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> formerly <S%H6440><s%> [were] Hamites. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2526><s%>

And these, <S%H428><s%> recorded <S%H3789><s%> by name, <S%H8034><s%> came <S%H935><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and attacked <S%H5221><s%> their tents, <S%H168><s%> and the Meunites <S%H4586><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were found <S%H4672><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them utterly <S%H2763><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and lived <S%H3427><s%> in their place; <S%H8478><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> there was pasture <S%H4829><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> for their flocks. <S%H6629><s%>

And from them, from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir, <S%H8165><s%> with Pelatiah, <S%H6410><s%> Neariah, <S%H5294><s%> Rephaiah, <S%H7509><s%> and Uzziel, <S%H5816><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ishi, <S%H3469><s%> as their leaders. <S%H7218><s%>

And they destroyed <S%H5221><s%> the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the Amalekites <S%H6002><s%> who <S%H6413><s%> escaped, <S%H6413><s%> and have lived <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
